example.text: Republicans are willing to drive the economy off a cliff to push their extreme, unpopular agenda—from cutting services for seniors to gutting health care for veterans. We’re not going to let that happen.

Dear Friend, I am thrilled to share some good end-of-year news: the Senate just voted 92-5 to add my bipartisan Providing Urgent Maternal Protections (PUMP) for Nursing Mothers Act into the year-end government funding bill. We must make it possible for every new mom returning to the workplace to have the option to continue breastfeeding-an option that is also really good for businesses.

The big funding bill, with the PUMP Act included, is headed to the US House of Representatives, and then to President Biden's desk to be signed into law! It's a great day for families and a great day for businesses!

Trump is again advocating his horrific cruel strategy of ripping children out of their parents’ arms to discourage immigration. Abusing children is NEVER acceptable. I will fight with every nerve and sinew to make sure America never again treats children in this fashion.

The big funding bill, with the PUMP Act included, is headed to the US House of Representatives, and then to President Biden's desk to be signed into law! It's a great day for families and a great day for businesses!

Good to meet with US Ambassador to [[user]] Yohannes Abraham yesterday. ASEAN plays a critical role in the Indo-Pacific, especially for increasing economic growth and regional stability—I look forward to working with Amb. Abraham to strengthen the US-ASEAN relationship. [[url]]

The big funding bill, with the PUMP Act included, is headed to the US House of Representatives, and then to President Biden's desk to be signed into law! It's a great day for families and a great day for businesses!
